title: With Bernadette in Papua New Guinea
creator_credit: David Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
brief_description: Focuses n the life of a young girl living in a village in Papua-New Guinea. Shows the customs of the people living the village, the schooling system, the working of garden plots, and the communal effort of the villagers constructing buildings such as an extension for the school.
